title: DBA Crypto Struggles to Launch as Fundraising Falls Short
description: DBA Crypto, a highly anticipated cryptocurrency fund launch of 2022, is still facing challenges in getting off the ground, according to recent filings with the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) and insider sources. The investment startup, which targeted raising a minimum of $500 million from external investors, had planned to launch in late 2022 or ... Read more

title: Justin Sun Pledges 10K TUSD Toward On-chain Sleuth’s Legal Battle
description:
TRON founder, Justin Sun, has pledged 10,000 TUSD to an acclaimed on-chain sleuth with Twitter identity ZachXBT. Sun’s pledge is targeted at supporting Zach in a defamation lawsuit against him for an article he published in June 2022. According to Sun, his support for Zach stems from the beneficiary’s substantial contributions to blockchain security and […]

The post Justin Sun Pledges 10K TUSD Toward On-chain Sleuth’s Legal Battle appeared first on Coin Edition.
